title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 DevOps Engineer
   

  

**This is Worldline**
 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

**The team**
 At Worldline, delivering an awesome payment experience that our customers love is what we live for. Our cloud-native acquiring platform is processing billions of card transactions including authorization processing and clearing and settlement for our customers to trust. Currently, we are looking for a skilled product-oriented DevOps Engineer to team up with one of our empowered product DevOps teams.
   

  

**Day-to-Day Responsibilities**
 Our autonomous teams work with a lean product focused DevOps culture that continuously delivers true outcome, and if you build it, you run it! This means that you are responsible for
   

  

 Active participation and contribution in all phases of the product lifecycle including discovery, delivery and operations.
   

  

* Delivering your team’s committed objectives, adapting to whatever is needed to reach the goal you and your team have committed yourselves to reach
* Participate in your team’s day-to-day activities including software development, operations, application monitoring, maintenance and support in addition to being an active member in our agile events like daily stand-ups, planning meetings, retrospectives and demos etc.
* Collaborating with and helping developers in the team, for example by doing code reviews, participating in pair programming and by sharing your knowledge


 You love identifying the outcomes to be achieved together with your team, our customers, internal users, other stakeholders and suppliers to deliver a truly outstanding acquiring processing experience for our customers and our business to love.
   

  

**Signs of Success**
* You are passionate about delivering a payment acquiring experience that brings value for our customers and our business
* You are highly collaborate setting your team first while also successfully collaborating with others
* You are a role model for your team and others by paying attention to commitment, accountability and the true outcome for yourself, your team, our customers and internal users
* You are comfortable in a fast-moving and agile culture – handling many different stakeholders, prioritizations and fast decisions is not an issue for you


**What We Can’t Do Without**
* 3+ years confirmed experience in software development. You know Python well enough to write applications for production use. You are comfortable working with relational databases (SQL). You are also comfortable working with version control (using Git, for example)
* A deep understanding of software quality assurance principles (and preferably experience in test automation)
* Deep knowledge of software architecture and design including information security and experience from high-availability API platforms
* Experience of developing and maintaining microservices (preferably both server-based and serverless) that are used in production
* Practical experience from working with Amazon Web Services, preferably with infrastructure-as-code via tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation. You are familiar with services such as S3, SQS, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, RDS and ECS
* Experience of working with Docker, preferably in Amazon ECS
* Experience from CI/CD production deployment using Jenkins pipelines (or similar)
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, engineering or another related field
* Full working proficiency in Swedish and/or English
* Valid working permit for Sweden (office location is Stockholm with hybrid work model)
* Experience of working with Java is a plus


**Skills We’d Like**
* Experience from DevOps ways of working and culture including fostering the DevOps culture, automation, lean flow, measurement, and recovery
* You should have experience of – or be ready to learn – React
* Paying attention to commitment, accountability and result for yourself and for your team
* Experience from developing secure and/or PCI-DSS certified solutions is considered an advantage
* Excellent communication and presentation abilities
* A technical mindset with phenomenal attention to detail
* Having a curious mindset, continuously learning and sharing your knowledge with your peers and others


**Perks & Benefits**
 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
   

  

* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


**Shape the evolution**
 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

**Learn more about life at Worldline at** 
**jobs.worldline.com**
**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: Principal Engineer / Team Lead (Cloud Systems)
description:
**About us** 




 We are a fast-growing technology company focused on developing cutting-edge security solutions that integrate sensors, video analytics, and real-time monitoring. Our product ecosystem connects end operators, security monitoring stations, and installers through a scalable cloud infrastructure.
 



  





 We are looking for an experienced
 **Principal Engineer / Team Lead** 
 to help design, build, and lead the next phase of our cloud solution. You will play a strategic role, balancing technical leadership, team development, and collaboration with key stakeholders to align technology with long-term business goals.
 



 Tips: Provide a summary of the role, what success in the position looks like, and how this role fits into the organization overall.
 



  





**About you** 




 As a
 **Principal Engineer / Team Lead** 
 , you will take ownership of the architecture, design, and technical leadership of our security system integration platform. You’ll work closely with other engineers, product managers, and business leaders to shape the solution's future. In this role, you will:
 


* Drive architectural decisions and cloud solution design (currently hosted on AWS)
* Assist in setting up a new team, including recruitment, onboarding, and mentoring
* Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to define the product roadmap and business strategy
* Contribute to developing new features when needed, particularly during critical stages of development



 This role offers both hands-on and strategic opportunities to influence a high-impact, business-critical solution.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




**Technical leadership** 



* Own the design and evolution of the platform's cloud architecture, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security
* Drive the adoption of best practices in microservices architecture, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps automation
* Act as a technical mentor, guiding other engineers through design and implementation challenges



**Team lead** 



* Lead the formation and development of a new engineering team, including hiring, training, and ongoing mentorship
* Define technical roles and responsibilities within the team, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture
* Collaborate with product managers, business stakeholders, and customers to prioritize features and technical improvements



  





**Qualifications** 




**Cloud Architecture:** 



* Expertise in designing and scaling cloud solutions (AWS preferred, including services like Lambda, S3, API Gateway, DynamoDB, RDS, SNS/SQS, etc.)
* Experience with microservices architecture and serverless computing models
* Strong understanding of security best practices (authentication, encryption, identity management)



**Programming & Development:** 



* Advanced proficiency in
 **TypeScript** 
 and JavaScript, with experience building large-scale applications
* Solid experience with backend development using Node.js (Express, NestJS)
* Experience with frontend technologies, particularly
 **React** 
 , and familiarity with state management solutions (Redux, Context API)
* Experience working with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, or other integration protocols



**DevOps & Automation:** 



* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, AWS CloudFormation), and deployment automation
* Experience monitoring and optimizing cloud infrastructure (AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, Datadog)



**Security System Integration:** 



* Familiarity with integrating sensors, video analytics, or other real-time security monitoring technologies (nice-to-have)



**Leadership and business skills** 



* Proven experience in a
 **team lead** 
 ,
 **principal engineer** 
 , or
 **technical manager** 
 role, driving both technical and organizational growth
* Strong project management skills, including the ability to plan and execute complex projects across multiple teams
* Experience communicating technical strategies and solutions to both technical teams and business stakeholders
* Strong mentoring and leadership skills to guide and support team members in their professional development

title: Chief Technology Officer
description:
**Vill du vara med och forma framtiden för ett av Sveriges mest välkända techbolag? Är du en visionär och handlingskraftig ledare som kombinerar teknisk expertis med strategiskt tänkande? Då kan detta vara din nästa utmaning!**
 Med 4 miljoner besökare per vecka och 80 miljoner sökningar i månaden är Hitta.se en av Sveriges största sajter. Sedan december 2024 är Hitta.se en del av Fonecta Group Oy, Finlands främsta aktör inom söktjänster för både företag och privatpersoner. Nu söker Hitta.se en Chief Technology Officer (CTO) som vill ta ansvar för vår tekniska strategi och leda vårt fantastiska tech-team mot fortsatt framgång.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som CTO på Hitta.se kommer du att ha helhetsansvar för vår tech-organisation. Du rapporterar direkt till VD och är en del av ledningsgruppen, där du tillsammans med övriga i teamet ansvarar för att säkerställa att Hitta.se fortsätter vara en innovativ och framåtlutad organisation. Din roll är avgörande för att vår tekniska strategi ska möjliggöra skalbarhet, stabilitet och innovation, samtidigt som AI och kundfokus är centralt i allt du gör.
   

  

 Du leder ett kompetent team på totalt 18 medarbetare, varav 6 direktrapporterande. Teamet består av både anställda och konsulter, med en mix av medarbetare som arbetar från vårt huvudkontor i Stockholm och remote från olika delar av Sverige och Europa.
   

  

 Som CTO kommer du även att spela en viktig roll i att forma samarbetet med de andra bolagen inom Fonecta-koncernen. Detta innebär att du kommer att vara en drivande kraft på en spännande resa där vi tillsammans skapar effektiva arbetssätt, delar teknisk kompetens och utforskar synergier som stärker hela gruppen.
   

  

**I Rollen Ingår**
**Strategiskt ledarskap**
* Definiera och kommunicera en övergripande teknisk vision och strategi som är i linje med företagets mål och förankrad i koncernens övergripande strategi.
* Driva teknisk innovation genom att ligga steget före såväl marknadstrender som kundbehov och nya teknologier.
* Tillsammans med kollegor inom koncernen arbeta för att identifiera synergier, bygga en effektiv organisationsstruktur och skapa maximalt värde för våra användare, kunder och medarbetare.
* Som en del av Hitta.se’s ledningsgrupp bidrar du till den övergripande strategiska utvecklingen av hitta.se och säkerställer att företagets vision och affärsmål förverkligas.


**Personal och budgetansvar**
* Leda, coacha och inspirera tech-teamet till att skapa en kultur präglad av samarbete, innovation och kundfokus.
* Stärka tvärfunktionellt samarbete med team inom bland annat Produkt, Business Intelligence och Försäljning, samt främja samverkan med andra bolag inom Fonecta-gruppen.
* Ansvara för budget och resursplanering för tech-teamet, med målet att balansera kostnader med effektivitet, prestanda och skalbarhet.
* I samråd med kollegor på övriga bolag inom Fonecta-gruppen besluta kring infrastruktur och verktyg för att optimera resurser och säkerställa framgång.


**Tekniskt ledarskap**
* Ansvara för den tekniska strategin för Hitta.se och samverka med kollegor från andra bolag inom Fonecta-gruppen.
* Säkerställa att tekniska beslut främjar skalbarhet, säkerhet och innovation, med AI som en central byggsten.
* Vidareutveckla och säkerställa best praxis inom mjukvaruutveckling, agila arbetssätt och AI.
* Inspirera organisationen i hur AI kan förstärka vår produkt, organisation och affär.


**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Har minst fem års erfarenhet av att leda en teknisk organisation i liknande skala, gärna i en roll som VP Engineering eller CTO på ett SaaS-företag.
* Har gedigen teknisk expertis och en stark förmåga att inspirera och leda organisationen i utformning och implementering av tekniska strategier.
* Erfarenhet av att leda i komplexa miljöer, integrera verksamheter och driva förändringsprocesser.
* Har ett genuint intresse för AI och dokumenterad erfarenhet av att implementera och tillämpa AI inom verksamheten.
* Har förmåga att översätta affärsstrategier till tekniska lösningar som skapar resultat.
* Är strategiskt lagd, men som också trivs med att vara hands-on vid behov.
* Är en stark och engagerande ledare med förmåga att inspirera och utveckla medarbetare, både onsite och remote.


**Vår Tech Stack**
**Infrastruktur & DevOps** 
 : Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, AWS, Grafana, Jenkins, ArgoCD.
   

  

**Development** 
 : TypeScript/Node.js, Next.js, React, React Nativesamt vissa äldre Java/C# microservices.
   

  

**Data & verktyg** 
 : PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ActiveMQ, Jenkins, GitHub Actions.
   

  

**Varför välja oss?**
 Hos oss får du en nyckelroll i ett av Sveriges mest välkända bolag i en väldigt spännande fas. Du får möjlighet att påverka och forma företagets och Fonecta-koncernens framtid.
   

  

 En central roll i ledningsgruppen och flexibilitet att kombinera arbete på vårt moderna och nyrenoverade kontor i Stockholms innerstad med möjlighet till remote-arbete två dagar per vecka.
   

  

 Arbeta med ett engagerat och skickligt team som brinner för innovation och teknik.
   

  

**Om Tjänsten**
 Startdatum: Snart som möjligt.
   

  

 Placering: På vårt huvudkontor, St Eriksgatan 119 i Stockholm.
   

  

 Känns det här som rätt utmaning för dig? Härligt! Skicka in ditt CV och personliga brev så snart som möjligt men senast 26 februari, vi arbetar med löpande urval.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Application Analyst needed!
company_industry: Staffing and Recruiting and Financial Services
description:
*Do you have at least 5 years of experience in roles involving application analysis, data analysis, or similar functions?* 
*If you are passionate about leveraging your SQL expertise and analytical skills to solve complex problems and drive application performance, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!* 




  





**About the position** 




 Perido is looking for a skilled and proactive Application Analyst on behalf of our client, a major bank with a vision to realize dreams and help its customers achieve their goals. The bank serves over 10 million customers and has offices across Northern Europe. The role of Application Analyst is critical for ensuring business-critical applications’ smooth functioning, enhancement, and optimization. This position is based in central Stockholm with the possibility of working 2 days a week remotely.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Application Management** 
 : Oversee the day-to-day performance, functionality, and maintenance of applications to ensure seamless operation.
* **SQL Development** 
 : Design, write, and optimize complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and scripts to support data processing and application functionality.
* **Data Analysis** 
 : Conduct in-depth data analysis to extract actionable insights, support decision-making, and resolve application-related issues.
* **System Modeling** 
 : Collaborate with stakeholders to develop and refine application models, ensuring alignment with business needs and goals.
* **Troubleshooting and Problem Solving** 
 : Diagnose and resolve application issues, identifying root causes and implementing effective solutions.
* **Collaboration and Support** 
 : Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, data engineers, and business analysts, to ensure applications meet organizational objectives.
* **Proactive Improvement** 
 : Continuously identify opportunities for improving application performance, scalability, and efficiency.



 The ideal candidate will bring strong technical expertise, particularly in SQL and data analysis, combined with problem-solving abilities and a proactive mindset.
 



  





 Is this the next big step in your career?
 



 We look forward to reading your application
 **in English** 
 !
 



  





**Qualifications:** 



* **SQL Expertise** 
 : Proven experience with SQL, including stored procedures, query optimization, and database management.
* **Experience** 
 : A minimum of 5 years in roles involving application analysis, data analysis, or similar functions.
* **Data Analysis and Modeling** 
 : Strong analytical skills, with experience in data modeling being a significant advantage.
* **Problem-Solving Abilities** 
 : Demonstrated capability to analyze complex setups, troubleshoot issues, and implement effective solutions.
* **Proactive Attitude** 
 : A self-starter with the eagerness to tackle challenges and improve existing processes.



  





**Meritorious:** 



* Experience with additional database technologies or tools (e.g., Oracle, PostgreSQL)
* Familiarity with data visualization and reporting tools
* Knowledge of application lifecycle management and best practices
* Background in collaborating with agile teams or experience in a DevOps environment



  





**Contract type and hours** 




 Full-time consulting assignment for 6 months. Start asap.
 



  





**Application** 




 Please apply through our website at perido.se/lediga-jobb/. Simply click the “Apply” button in the job advertisement, fill in your details, and upload your CV. We recommend submitting your application as soon as possible, as the selection process is ongoing. Please note that some details about the assignment and/or client company may have been deliberately disclosed in the advertisement. If your profile matches what the client is looking for and you are contacted by a recruiter, you will receive all the information you need.
 



  





**About Perido** 




 Why is our company named Perido? The name comes from the Latin word
 *Peridoneus* 
 , which means ‘well-matched’. Perido is a consulting and recruitment company specializing in the white-collar sector, dedicated to helping you take the next step in your career. Our vision is to ensure that everyone thrives and feels engaged at work. We have grown steadily since our founding in 2003 and now have over 1,500 employees across the country, including around fifty internal staff at our headquarters in Stockholm and Gothenburg. As a Perido consultant, you’ll play a key role in our organization, growing alongside us while strengthening our clients’ businesses with your skills. Please visit our website www.perido.se for more information.

title: Software Engineer DevOps - API Governance team, Solna-Hybrid
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Join us in shaping the future of API management at PostNord!**
**The team**
 The API Governance team plays a central role at PostNord, managing multi-cloud and hybrid API Gateway platforms. Our platform enables product teams across the organization to deploy independent software solutions as APIs, seamlessly integrating them into the API gateway. This allows internal and external consumers to efficiently discover, access, and utilize these APIs through a developer portal.
   

  

 With the growing demand for APIs—from customers (e-tailers), partners (TA partners), recipients, and PostNord’s own interfaces like the PostNord app—our goal is to accelerate API integration, ensure high availability, reliability, and scalability, and continuously enhance the API gateway platform to meet evolving business needs.
   

  

**Your profile**
 The API Platform team is looking for a skilled DevOps engineer who will play a critical role to support the deployment and management of our multi-cloud API Gateway platform across AWS, Azure and on-prem. In this role, you will also be partnering with different development teams and areas to understand the API integration needs to support our unit in integrating APIs into the platform. It is important that you are a quick learner, have good communication and interpersonal skills and a passion to deliver value and high quality.
   

  

**Role & Responsibilities**
* Deploy, manage, and maintain the multi-cloud API Gateway platform across AWS, Azure and on-prem.
* Build and optimize CI/CD pipelines for seamless API integration and deployment.
* Manage containerized environments using Kubernetes, or similar technologies.
* Contribute to automation, observability, and infrastructure as code (IaC) initiatives.
* Collaborate with development teams to onboard APIs into the gateway by applying different security policies.
* Handle API lifecycle management, including versioning, security, and deprecation.
* Monitor, troubleshoot, and optimize platform performance to ensure high availability and reliability.
* Monitor API traffic to detect anomalies such as unusual spikes, error rates, or unauthorized access patterns.
* Support day-to-day operational activities, ensuring smooth functioning of the API gateway. It is a big plus if you have experience in e-commerce and logistics.


**Required Skills & Qualifications**
* 5+ years IT experience with at least 3 years working experience with Cloud technologies (AWS or Azure)
* Hands-on with languages & tools relevant to CI/CD Pipeline implementation.
* Experience in leveraging IaC (Infrastructure as Code) for deployment automation using Terraform in AWS and Azure.
* Sound knowledge of networking, firewalls and security aspects.
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack).
* Solid understanding of REST APIs, authentication mechanisms, API gateways and API security best practices.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work with cross-functional teams and support API integration and operational needs.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools like Jira/Confluence, Miro etc.


**We offer you**
**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receive your application! If you have any questions or concerns, please contact manager Beatrice Dahlström at beatrice.dahlstrom@postnord.com. Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain highly reliable and scalable web applications using React and NextJS.
* Implement server-side rendering to improve the performance and user experience of web applications.
* Write comprehensive unit tests and end-to-end tests to ensure the robustness and reliability of the frontend applications.
* Collaborate with the backend team to integrate APIs and services.
* Participate in code reviews to maintain a high-quality codebase.


- 

**Leadership Responsibilities**
* Take \*\*ownership\*\* of projects from conception to production deployment.
* Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and clients to ensure requirements are met and to discuss any potential challenges.
* Collaborate with various stakeholders, including product managers, designers, and backend engineers, to ensure that the frontend applications align with the company’s goals.
* Provide and refactor a code base that enables the other engineers on the team.
* Lead technical initiatives or coach and mentor other engineers to own features from start to finish themselves.
* Balance tech-debt vs delivering value.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Proven experience as a Frontend Engineer or Fullstack JavaScript/TypeScript Engineer.
* Proficiency in React, NextJS, TypeScript and server-side rendering.
* Experience with frontend testing frameworks and strategies, such as Playwright and Storybook.
* Strong leadership skills and the ability to take ownership of projects.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, including documentation and sharing knowledge with colleagues.


**Meritorious**
* Familiarity with backend JavaScript frameworks and runtimes, such as Node.js and Bun.
* Experience with cloud infrastructure in AWS/Azure or similar.
* Container orchestration engines, e.g. Kubernetes.
* GraphQL.
* Content Distribution Networks, e.g. Akamai.


**Application deadline:** 
 16-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: (Senior) Software Quality Assurance Engineer – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate – Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO), Platforms & Services Department (P&S), Integration Division (INT), Integration Solutions Unit (ISU) at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a
 **(Senior) Software Quality Assurance Engineer\*.**
**This is a full-time position at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
* internal benchmark: (Senior) Engineer IT Technology & Infrastructure


***Panel interviews are anticipated for August 2024***
 Purpose
   

  

 We are looking for someone with a strong background in software testing methodologies, encompassing manual, automated, performance, and regression testing, combined with a deep understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC). If you're interested in defining test strategies, coordinating test activities and leading a team of test engineers in ensuring the delivery of high-quality software integration solutions, this position is perfect for you! Hands-on experience in writing manual or automated test cases for complex and long-term software products is essential for the role. Join our team and take your career to the next level.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will report directly to the Head of Unit and will work in close contact with platform leads and with the other colleagues across the department.
   

  

 The Integration Solutions Unit focuses on designing, developing, implementing, and maintaining integration solutions that facilitate seamless communication and interaction between different software systems, applications, or components within the EIB Group.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Define test strategies and plans to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
* Coordinate test activities and prioritize testing requirements.
* Assess the performance and scalability of the integration solutions under different conditions to identify bottlenecks or performance issues.
* Lead a team of test engineers and developers to execute testing activities effectively.
* Write manual or automated test cases to validate software functionality.
* Develop and implement automated testing frameworks and tools.
* Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous testing and early defect identification.
* Analyse test results and collaborate with development teams to address issues.
* Ensure adherence to software quality standards and best practices.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in computer science, economics or related disciplines
* At least 5 years of relevant professional experience in manual and/or automated software testing
* Experience in testing of APIs including authentication/authorisation mechanisms (such as OAuth, SAML)
* Experience in using test management tools such as Jira, Xray, TestRail
* Experience with tools such as Postman, RESTAssured, SOAPUI, selenium, cypress, katalon, JMeter, LoadRunner, Mockito, WireMock, DBUnit, Jenkins, Azure DevOps
* Experience in writing and executing SQL queries for database testing
* Experience in working with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud as a nice to have
* Experience in writing and maintaining automated test scripts using testing frameworks and programming languages like Python or Java would be an asset.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*), with a good command of the other. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We are an equal opportunities employer, who believes that diversity is good for our people and our business. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 Applicants with specific needs are encouraged to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

 Deadline for applications: This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt

title: Technical Account Manager (Sweden)
description:
**Description**
 At Amazon, our vision is to be earth’s most customer-centric company. In 2006, we launched Amazon Web Services, giving customers access to the same cloud technology we built to serve millions of shoppers on Amazon.com. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a secure cloud services platform, offering computing power, database storage, content delivery, and other functionality to help businesses scale and grow. Millions of businesses are using AWS cloud solutions to build sophisticated applications with increased flexibility, scalability and reliability.
   

  

**About AWS**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 An AWS Technical Account Manager is a trusted advisor and cloud operations architect for our Enterprise Support customers. As a trusted advisor you’ll have a direct impact in helping our customers gain the most value from cloud technology. You’ll craft and execute strategies to drive our customers’ adoption and use of AWS services. This includes a range of products including EC2, S3, DynamoDB & RDS databases, Lambda, CloudFront CDN, IoT and many more.
   

  

 Our Technical Account Managers partner with some of the most iconic businesses in the country. These range from rising startups building their business from scratch through to large enterprises going through significant transformation. You’ll provide advice on architecture, support strategy, project and launch planning as well as ongoing operational issues.
   

  

**See What The Team Say About Their Roles**
 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-liga-sr-technical-account-manager
   

  

 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-balint-senior-technical-account-manager
   

  

 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-shlomo-senior-technical-account-manager
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* You’ll advise on solutions, provide technical guidance and advocate for the customer
* Ensure AWS environments remain operationally healthy whilst reducing cost and complexity
* Develop trusting relationships with customers, understanding their business needs and technical challenges
* Using your technical acumen and customer obsession, you’ll drive technical discussions regarding incidents, trade-offs, and risk management
* Consult with a range of partners from developers through to C-suite executives
* Collaborate with AWS Solutions Architects, Business Developers, Professional Services Consultants, and Sales Account Managers
* With a bias for action, you'll proactively find opportunities for customers to gain additional value from AWS
* Provide detailed reviews of service events, monthly & quarterly metrics, detailed pre-launch planning
* Solve a variety of problems across different customers as they migrate their workloads to the cloud
* Uplift customer capabilities by running workshops, brown bag sessions, etc.


 A day in the life
   

  

 “AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.”
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in a similar role as a Technical Account Manager, Consultant, Solutions Architect, Platform Engineer, Systems Engineer, Cloud Architect etc.
* Understand operational parameters and troubleshooting for a combination of the following: Compute, Storage, Networking, CDN, Databases, DevOps, Big Data and Analytics, Security, Applications Development
* Internal enterprise or external customer-facing experience with the ability to clearly articulate to small and large audiences
* Ability to juggle tasks and projects in a fast-paced environment
* Customer obsessed


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Professional experience with cloud offerings such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform etc.
* Programming or scripting skills with a combination of Java, Python Perl, Ruby, C#, and/or PHP a plus but not a requirement
* Previous experience as a Software Engineer, Developer, DevOps Engineer etc.
* Understanding of DevOps practices and tools including Continuous Integration / Deployment, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes, Chef is a plus


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2854031

title: Next Generation PKI & Product Integrity Services
description:
**About This Opportunity**
 Integrity of Ericsson products is important so that our customers can validate that it is authentic Ericsson Hardware or Software that they have received. Customers expect also that our delivered software is free from malware.
   

  

 Our sector “Production System, Operation and Security” provides Public Key Infrastructure management, Malware Scanning Services and Data Signing Services for Ericsson products across the company. We also provide a service for auto-generation of SBOM’s (Software Bill of Material), to be transparent to Ericsson customers what FOSS components we have included in our products and to show that these are not vulnerable.
   

  

 For the services we provide, we have the full responsibility for the complete stack. This includes for example hardware installations, platform deployment, feature development, maintenance of services and finally, the operation of the same. We do this together with teams in Finland.
   

  

 Due to growing need of integrity and authenticity, we need to strengthen our organization. This ad is targeting an Operation/Developer Engineer (with more Operation profile) for one of our XFT teams in Stockholm/Sweden.
   

  

 We are hosted in a Functional Unit called Engineering Services & Experience (FU ESE) which is one of the units within Business Unit Networks (BNEW) - RAN Software & Compute Platforms Engineering (RCE)
   

  

 We are actively seeking the next wave of tech talent through our NextGen graduate initiative in Stockholm. This opportunity is for recent graduates with 0-3 years of experience who are eager to launch a meaningful career in technology. Although we have an exceptional team in place, we are always focused on building for the future. If you're ready to make an impact, this is your chance to join us.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 We are now looking for a newly graduated DevOps Engineer, who will take active part in operations, maintenance and development of one of our services.
   

  

 You will work in an end-to-end team in Stockholm/Sweden which have the full responsibility for feature development, quality assurance activities, maintenance, release & deployment, and customer support.
   

  

 We have a deep collaboration with our sister organization in Finland, so daily interaction with teams in Finland can be expected.
   

  

 Your main responsibility will be:
   

  

* Operational Support including system configuration for provisioning signing flows
* Monitoring our Continuous Integration (CI) flow, including troubleshooting.
* Maintenance of the service.
* Drive continuous improvements of products and processes.
* Be responsible for user and system documentation being accurate and informative.
* Feature development, including QA activities.


**You will bring**
 To be successful in the role, the following competencies below are needed:
   

  

* Bachelor/Master’s degree in relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience
* Experience of Linux (preferably Red Hat) and scripting skills (Python and/or Bash)
* Good programming skills, preferably in Java.
* Team-collaboration skills, enjoy sharing knowledge and takes initiatives to contribute to team success.
* Curious personality, good communication skills and a security-aware mindset.


 Besides, the following competencies are beneficial:
   

  

* Knowledge of Public Key Infrastructure and related processes, X.509 certificates
* Knowledge of Certificate enrollment protocols, key lifecycle management and HSMs
* Knowledge of Log Management (preferably remote logging and log monitoring)
* Knowledge of test automation, preferably by using TestNG and/or JUnit
* Knowledge of Continuous Integration & Deployment and troubleshooting.
* Knowledge of Ansible for application deployment.
* Knowledge using hypervisors and virtualization, preferably Nutanix product family.
* Experience of problem investigation, incident responses and Root Cause Analysis


 Join our Team
   

  

 ]]>

title: Senior IAM Engineer| SEB, Solna
description:
Are you passionate about new technology and making a difference? Join our digital transformation!
   

  

 The IAM Platform team is now looking for their new team member. The team consists of about 4 people. We work closely together and share the passion for great technology and creating a smooth engineering experience. Our group consists of people with different expertise, experiences, age and background. We have an open and friendly approach towards each other.
   

  

**About the role:**
 At this position within Hosting & Integration, you will be a part of a highly skilled team working with modern technology, security and developing of the IAM platforms, which are integrated in SEB DevOps toolchains. As a senior IAM Engineer you will create and evolve our IAM platform by investigating, developing, and implementing different technical solutions. This area is highly prioritized which creates many collaborations with various parts of the SEB organization. You will also be involved in SEB cloud journey.
   

  

 Your tasks will include designing, implementing and managing IAM solutions, deploying and managing the IAM Infrastructure, troubleshooting and resolving issues, ensuring compliance with security policies and best practices. In this role you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve the overall security posture of the organisation
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* Extensive experience on identity federation technology (OpenID Connect, OAuth2).
* Extensive experience with Single Sign-On and Multi Factor Authentication solution (FIDO2).
* Hands on experience with the DevSecOps tools (e.g. managing platforms with Kubernetes, Git, Github actions).
* Experience of programming languages, such as Python, Java, go and Javascript.
* Hands on experience with different cloud platforms.
* Attention to Detail
* CriticalThinking


**What we offer:**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than1th of December2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Team Manager Yacir Persson Chelbat via email at Yacir.perssonchelbat@seb.se
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEBhere** 
 : www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Infrastructure Lead
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a critical part of our platform strategy. As a leader of the SRE team, you will focus on guiding your team in providing technical expertise and support to our engineering teams to enable them to deliver high-quality software solutions efficiently.
   

  

 Your team will be responsible for providing continuous support to other departments, overcoming major technical hurdles, improving performance , implementing system monitoring and building highly available software.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Providing support and leadership for our SRE team to solve operational challenges.
* Managing the assignment of tasks for the team according to priorities and capacity.
* Having a positive attitude and the ability to understand the critical urgency of topics and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ensuring non-functional requirements for all applications and tools are met and clearly communicated.
* Providing counsel to our internal software engineering team and proactively suggesting improvements on how to operate our microservice-based solution.
* Provide informal feedback on an ongoing basis and formal feedback in the annual performance evaluation process to identify and develop talent.
* Coaching Payments Product team members in achieving goals and developing necessary skills.
* Organise team trainings and initiatives.
* Identify team goals and evaluate team progress.


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* Minimum 5 years of software engineering or devops experience.
* Minimum 2 years of experience as a team lead or manager.
* Practical experience in using common cloud APIs.
* Strong knowledge of Linux and shell scripting, as well as higher level protocols and patterns like HTTP/3, REST, JSON and gRPC.
* Expertise in systems integration and distributed large scale microservice deployments.
* Experience in operating and monitoring container workloads and similar technologies.
* Strong code reading and understanding skills with at least one high level programming language


 NICE TO HAVES
   

  

* Experience from the iGaming industry is meriting


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy.
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply).
* 30 annual vacation days.
* Occupational Pension.
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually.
* Parental Leave Top-Up.
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner.
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance.
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts.
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US
   

  

 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

* As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: Data & AI Architect
description:
Avanade is on a mission to become the top Microsoft Data & AI consultancy in the Nordics, delivering award-winning expertise and innovative solutions. We are seeking an experienced Data & AI Architect to join our team and drive this vision forward in the Swedish market.
   

  

 Avanade is the leading global provider of digital, cloud, AI and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Founded in 2000 as a joint venture between Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation, Avanade has more certifications, Gold-level competencies and most valued professionals (MVPs) than any other Microsoft partner. Every day, our 60,000 professionals in 26 countries innovate responsibly to make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.
   

  

**Come join us**
 In this role, you will combine technical depth, consulting acumen, and exceptional communication skills. You’ll engage with client C-suites as a trusted advisor while also guiding and sparring with developer teams. Your contributions will shape the future of Data & AI in Sweden while delivering measurable business value to clients.
   

  

**Skills And Experiences**
**Skills and Experiences**
* Deep Technical Expertise: Proven delivery experience in at least two of the following: Reporting solutions on Azure (e.g., Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Power BI) with modern architecture patterns. Data & AI operational strategy and business alignment. Generative AI use cases using Databricks Mosaic AI and Microsoft AI Services.
* Strategic Communication: Confidence in engaging with executives and presenting complex solutions in clear business terms.
* Developer Engagement: Ability to collaborate with and mentor developer teams to ensure alignment and quality in delivery.
* Technical Leadership: Experience leading teams in delivering impactful Data & AI projects.
* Languages: Fluency in Swedish (spoken and written) is strongly preferred. English fluency is required.


**In Addition, These Will Help You Stand Out**
* Azure certifications such as Solutions Architect Expert or Data Engineer Associate.
* Experience with CI/CD and DevOps in Data & AI projects.
* Familiarity with modern data architectures such as Lakehouse or Data Vault.
* Cross-functional leadership experience in global or regional teams.


**About You**
**Characteristics that can spell success for this role:**
* Consultative, collaborative, analytical
* Resilient, adaptable, flexible
* Humble leader, strong negotiator, relationship builder
* Passionate about tech and engaging with and advising clients


**What You'll Do**
**Solution Delivery**
* Design and deliver large-scale Data & AI solutions that align with client goals and modern best practices.
* Provide technical leadership in at least two of the following areas: Reporting Solutions: Azure Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Power BI, using modern architectural patterns (e.g., Delta, Lambda, Kappa). Data & AI Strategy: Creating operational models and aligning AI initiatives with business goals. Generative AI: Leveraging Databricks Mosaic AI and Microsoft AI Services.


**Client Engagement**
* Act as a thought leader and trusted advisor to C-suite executives, translating technical concepts into actionable business strategies.
* Focus on the Swedish market, building strong relationships with local clients and stakeholders.
* Support pre-sales activities and proactively originate opportunities by identifying client challenges and aligning them with Avanade’s capabilities.


**Team Collaboration**
* Mentor junior team members and ensure delivery quality across projects.
* Collaborate across teams to maintain excellence in delivery and align solutions with business growth objectives.


**Thought Leadership**
* Contribute to Avanade’s thought leadership initiatives, such as speaking engagements and content creation, to showcase our Data & AI expertise in the Nordics.
* Advocate for modern Data & AI technologies and methodologies both internally and externally.


**Learn more**
 Avanade is the leading global provider of digital, cloud, AI and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Founded in 2000 as a joint venture between Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation, Avanade has more certifications, Gold-level competencies and most valued professionals (MVPs) than any other Microsoft partner. Every day, our 60,000 professionals in 26 countries innovate responsibly to make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.
   

  

 To learn more about the types of projects our Analytics team works on check out this information
   

  

* Thyssenkrupp Materials Services uses data to help strike a delicate operational balance https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/thyssenkrupp
* What matters to SSE Renewables is innovating for a sustainable future https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/sse-renewables-ai
* Hachette UK enables employees with machine learning-driven contract searches https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/hachette-automated-identification
* Marston Holdings identifies significant cloud savings https://www.avanade.com/en-gb/clients/marston-holdings


 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

 Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation https://www.avanade.com/en/blogs/avanade-insights
   

  

 Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade https://www.avanade.com/en/blogs/inside-avanade
   

  

**Applications will be reviewed from Monday 6th January 2025**
**Enjoy your career**
**Some Of The Best Things About Working At Avanade**
* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year (14 years in a row), with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


 Find out more about some of our benefits: https://www.avanade.com/en/career/benefits
   

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you will get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page
   

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on

 Inspire greatness in our people by

 Accelerate the impact of our people by
   

  

* Amazing the client

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Avanade believes that all persons are entitled to equal employment opportunities, and we do not discriminate against our employees, applicants, or job seekers because of their race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, disability, veteran status, age, marital status, sexual orientation, genetic information, gender identity, or any other protect group status as defined by law.

title: Nätsäkerhetsspecialist / Nätsäkerhetsarkitekt
description:
Nu söker vi fler kollegor till vårt Cybersecurity-team på HiQ. Här finns möjligheten att tillsammans med ett starkt team hjälpa intressanta företag, och i förlängningen privatpersoner, att leva i en säkrare digital framtid. På HiQ arbetar vi i framkant med cybersäkerhet, det innebär helt nya tekniska lösningar som utvecklas där säkerhet är viktigt, och med nya regelverk där våra kunder behöver vår expertis både i rådgivning och leverans.
   

  

 På HiQ finns en möjlighet att vara med och bygga något stort. Det är en lärorik och rolig resa vi har framför oss där vår spelplan är enorm och du kan göra ordentliga avtryck. Vi kommer värdera din erfarenhet och dina tankar om hur vi på bästa sätt kan bygga vidare området. Vi har en bred kundbas där du får möjlighet att testa olika branscher och får uppdrag hos både kunder med ett väletablerat cybersäkerhetsarbete samt hos kunder i kritiska faser där vår erfarenhet är helt avgörande.
   

  

**Matchar vi?**
 Vi fokuserar mycket på vem du är då vi är ett kulturdrivet företag där våra ledord: resultat, ansvar, enkelhet och glädje driver oss framåt.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen som Nätsäkerhetsspecialist / Nätsäkerhetsarkitekt tror vi att du har minst 3 års erfarenhet inom design/implementation/drift av nät- och nätsäkerhetslösningar i större organisationer, automation med fokus på nät, utveckling av nätbaserade lösningar som stödjer, effektiviserar, följer säkerhetskraven likväl som organisationens krav på funktionalitet.
   

  

 Vi ser även att du talar flytande svenska och gärna besitter kunskap kring / har jobbat med något av följande:
   

  

* Nätverk – switching, routing, wifi, SDWAN, VPN, lastbalansering, datacenter, on-prem, cloud. Management verktyg tex Catalyst center/DNAC
* Nätverkssäkerhet – brandväggar, IPS/IDS, proxy, loggning, övervakning, pki
* Programmering/scripting – Python, Ansible, Bash, Power shell, Git, Netconf/Yang, Cisco NSO, CI/CD pipelines github/gitlab/azure devops
* Erfarenhet av virtualisering och containermiljöer, ex. VMWare och Docker.
* Gärna olika leverantörer såsom Cisco, Juniper, HPE/Aruba, Palo Alto, Check Point, Fortinet, Azure, etc.


 Exempel på meriterande certifieringar: CCNP, CCIE, CCDP, CCDE, FCP, JNCIP, PCNSE.
   

  

**Om HiQ:**
 Att vara HiQare är både utmanande och omväxlande. Vi är alla konsulter vilket innebär att vi i våra projekt hos kund eller in-house får prova nytt och bli exponerad för nya branscher, arbetsplatser och tech-stacks. Variationen är stor och utvecklingstakten snabb. Hos oss får du bidra och bemästra dina starkaste kompetenser, men även utforska och utveckla nya. Med rätt attityd och kompetens bidrar du med värde både i ditt uppdrag och till dina kollegor på HiQ.
   

  

 Tillsammans består vi idag av närmare 2000 HiQare i fyra länder. Hos oss hittar du allt från marknadens vassaste utvecklare, testare och hackers, till projektledare, agila coacher och designers. På HiQ har vi alltid fokuserat på två saker: Vi ska vara sjukt duktiga på det vi gör men vi ska också ha kul på vägen. Att ha kul på jobbet och leverera lösningar utöver förväntningar är vad som driver oss. Det har resulterat i banbrytande produkter och tjänster (självkörande lastbilar, möjligheten att övningsflyga utan att lämna marken, swisha pengar eller gå på restaurang och beställa mat med lego).
   

  

 Ja, du hör ju. Spännande, visst?
   

  

 Hos oss finns alla möjliga roliga forum för de flesta av intressen – rockband, cybersäkerhet, bygga tangentbord, löpning, schack, ölbryggning eller hållbarhet. Du väljer! Hos oss kan du vara Cyberexpert och rockstjärna samtidigt ;)

title: Senior Power-BI
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Ge stöd kring incidenter kring hämtnings- och laddningsflöden.
* Datamodellering och integration av nya datakällor.
* Justeringar av befintlig datamodell.
* Stöd och utveckling av nyckeltal och rapporter i Power BI.
* Sätta upp flöden för inläsning av filer.
* Stöd kring konvertering från äldre miljö (MSSQL och QlikView).
* Programmering inom Python, XML och Json.
* Utbildning av både administratörer och utvecklare i dataplattformen


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* God kommunikationsförmåga i svenska, både skriftligt och muntligt.
* Erfarenhet från att hantera dataskyddsförordningen (GDPR)
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av arbete inom Hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av Power BI.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av SQL Server Analysis Services
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av Azure Data Factory
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av T-SQL och MS SQL Server
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av erfarenhet av Azure Devops och GIT inklusive Python
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av XML
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av JSON


**Meriterande**
 Kunskap om hybridarkitektur för dataplattformar i Microsoft miljö.
   

  

 Erfarenhet av utbildning inom Business Intelligence av både administratörer och utvecklare i dataplattformen.
   

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 17-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Penetrationstestare till Riksbanken
description:
Har du erfarenhet av att jobba med Sliver, Cobalt Strike eller Bloodhound? Vet du vad DNS exfiltrering, EDR bypassing och memory injection innebär? Då kan det vara just dig vi söker! Läs vidare för att se om tjänsten som penetrationstestare på Sveriges riksbank kan vara något för dig.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Riksbanken är navet i Sveriges finansiella system och våra IT-system är grunden för vår finansiella stabilitet och utveckling. Vår IT-miljö är omfattande och består av flera samhällskritiska system som ställer mycket höga krav på säkerhet. Vi är både en myndighet och ”bankernas bank” vilket ställer höga krav på stabilitet, långsiktighet och att vi ligger i framkant inom IT- och cybersäkerhetsfrågor.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Vi som arbetar med att skydda Riksbankens IT-system nöjer oss inte med att vara ”bara” bra, utan vi strävar alltid efter att vara bäst. För att vi ska nå denna målbild krävs att vi hela tiden strävar efter att förbättra våra förmågor och vår kompetens. Vi söker därför dig som vill bidra till att stärka och utveckla vår IT- och cybersäkerhet. Som Penetrationstestare hos oss får du en unik chans att arbeta med kritiska system och att sätta din prägel på säkerhetsarbetet.
   

  

 Som penetrationstestare på Sveriges riksbank arbetar du tillsammans med IT och verksamheten för att förstå och identifiera vad som behöver testas. Penetrationstester utförs i samarbete med SOC-analytiker som säkerställer att nödvändig upptäcksförmåga finns på plats.
   

  

 Som Penetrationstestare Hos Oss Kommer Du Att Spela En Avgörande Roll i Att Skydda Våra IT-system Och Infrastruktur. Det Innebär Bl.a Att
   

  

* Planera och genomföra Red/Purple Team-tester
* Genomföra penetrationstester av vår IT-miljö, inklusive samhällskritiska system, infrastruktur, molntjänster och klienter
* Koordinera och stödja externa penetrationstester
* Delta i cybersäkerhetstävlingar (till exempel CTF)


**Du Ges Dessutom Möjlighet Att**
* Delta i internationella forum inom IT-säkerhetsområdet
* Stödja Riksbankens systemutveckling med dess DevSecOps arbete
* Bidra till intern kompetenshöjning genom utbildningar eller interna labbar där medarbetare får testa på ”hacking”


**Ditt team**
 Riksbankens IT-verksamhet leds av en IT-chef och består av sex enheter som leds av varsin enhetschef. Du tillhör Enheten för Säkerhet & Arkitektur där du kommer arbeta nära och i samarbete med andra Penetrationstestare, SOC-ansvarig, IT-säkerhetsansvariga, IT-säkerhetsarkitekter, systemansvariga, IT-arkitekter, verksamheten, och Riksbankens leverantörer.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har**
 Vi söker dig som har en universitets- eller högskoleutbildning inom datateknik, datavetenskap eller systemvetenskap. Alternativt har du erhållit kunskaper genom arbetslivserfarenhet som vi bedömer som motsvariga. Du har en stark teknisk förståelse, uppskattar att fördjupa dig i tekniska detaljer och vill ständigt lära dig nya saker inom området. Du är självgående, strukturerad, målinriktad och har en god analytisk förmåga.
   

  

**Krav**
* Flera års erfarenhet av att genomföra avancerade penetrationstester
* God kunskap av svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av systemutveckling och programmering
* Relevant certifiering inom området. Exempelvis certifieringar från Offensive Security, SANS eller certifieringarna CRTO, CRTO II
* Erfarenhet från Capture the Flag övningar
* Djup teknisk kunskap från Windows- och Linuxmiljöer


**Att arbeta på Riksbanken**
 Riksbanken är en myndighet under riksdagen som ser till att pengarna behåller sitt värde över tid och att betalningar kan ske säkert och effektivt. Vi ger också ut Sveriges sedlar och mynt. Vi arbetar på medborgarnas uppdrag för en stark och säker ekonomi. Här får du utmaningar utvecklas varje dag i en händelserik miljö. Hos oss får du kunniga och engagerade kollegor och stor möjlighet till kompetensutveckling. Läs mer om hur det är att arbeta på Riksbanken

title: Enterprise Architect – SAP
description:
**Provide solution architecture support to the SAP ECC to SAP S/4 Hana upgrade project. This will be done in close collaboration with e.g. company’s Lead architect for the domain. The work will include responding to different architecture problem spaces associated with possible options at hand that will enable the infrastructure upgrade. The most critical design topics in scope will be related to integration design including the impact from an information security perspective.**


### **Requirements**


* Solid experience as a solution architect for SAP ECC to SAP S/4 Hana upgrade projects.
* Solid understanding of the design of S/4 Hana.
* Solid experience with architecting integration design options in an on-premise and Cloud set-up.
* Solid experience and understanding of Information Security.
* Ability and drive to capture and understand the end-to-end perspective of any separate design/solution proposed.
* Ability to document architecture proposals both thru standard notations and in any other formats (depending on the audience), catering for transparency and understanding.
* Beneficial if the candidate have worked with SAP Integration Suite and other BTP applications.
